title: Labour conference chance to show alternative to ‘toxic divide and decline’ offered by Reform, says Starmer – UK politics live
summary: At the Labour Party conference, the Prime Minister highlighted it as a significant chance to present the party's vision to the nation. He emphasized the importance of effectively communicating their policies and objectives. The conference is seen as a pivotal moment for garnering public support.

title: Brentford 3-1 Manchester United: Premier League – live reaction
summary: Ruben Amorim's team faced a disappointing defeat marked by a chaotic first 25 minutes. Their performance was characterized by glaring mistakes and poor execution. The loss continues the team's streak of underwhelming results this season.
